item.title: Environments
item.description:
Environments #

Creating #

Before you can use some products in the system, you will need to create an environment. An environment in dev-team-tools should map 1:1 to your defined environments within your system, e.g. stage to stage, and prod to prod. So for each environment you have, there should be a corrisponding dev-team-tool’s environment defined.

These must have a unique name within your system, and will be used with the SDK / rest requests so we recommend making them human readable.
